column4: where can i find some good wiki on what i need to start on boot and what dont have to, i want to accelerate boot times...
how would a wiki know what someone needs or not?
easy, telling what every thing do

I've uninstalled gdm, bluetooth stuff, and other things which were shown up in some logs. however, these actions can (will) destroy your working system and configs. Maybe you should look at your logs and read about every element which is loaded during the boot progress
